about_the_game:
The game “King of The Jesters” is a first-person adventure horror with puzzles.

After another episode, the lead singer of a punk rock band finds himself in a world of his fantasies.
Here, he meets all the characters from his songs and tries to understand their complicated fates. Decide their fate or guide them to the path of truth.
The choice is yours.

Immerse yourself in the world that inspired and guided the main character in his creativity.
Music or something more?

Features:


The Enchanted Forest Bewitches
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of madness and enjoy it.


Someone is always behind you, watching you.


Poly-antagonism
The locations in the game reflect the external and internal appearance of each antagonist.
You are in for an exciting acquaintance with unique characters and their destinies.

Alternative Plot Options
Dive into the lives of the game’s characters. Learn their stories and help solve their problems. Participate in various events and find ways to escape the predicaments you might find yourself in against your will.

Rock, Rock, and More Rock
Travel the world to unique punk rock music created by talented musicians inspired by our game.

See Everything Hidden
Use the cursed skull "Gosha" to see hidden objects.


Stay Alert
Animals and mystical forest dwellers can pose a threat to you.


A Vast Amount of Interactivity
You can interact with the environment and explore it.


King of the Jesters is not just a game; it is a gaming masterpiece that will immerse you in a world of rock tales.

short_description: After another fit, the lead singer of a punk rock band finds himself in the world of his fantasies. Here he is greeted by strange creatures, horrifying monsters, and bloody stories. Will the main character be able to return to his world or will he remain here forever?
